items.title: Awesome Deep Learning
items.content_text:
### Table of Contents / Videos and Lectures

*   [Understand what is Deep Learning](https://www.scaler.com/topics/what-is-deep-learning/)

### Researchers / Miscellaneous

*   [Caffe Webinar](http://on-demand-gtc.gputechconf.com/gtcnew/on-demand-gtc.php?searchByKeyword=shelhamer\&searchItems=\&sessionTopic=\&sessionEvent=4\&sessionYear=2014\&sessionFormat=\&submit=\&select=+)
*   [100 Best Github Resources in Github for DL](http://meta-guide.com/software-meta-guide/100-best-github-deep-learning/)
*   [Word2Vec](https://code.google.com/p/word2vec/)
*   [Caffe DockerFile (⭐81)](https://github.com/tleyden/docker/tree/master/caffe)
*   [TorontoDeepLEarning convnet (⭐506)](https://github.com/TorontoDeepLearning/convnet)
*   [gfx.js (⭐125)](https://github.com/clementfarabet/gfx.js)
*   [Torch7 Cheat sheet (⭐9.1k)](https://github.com/torch/torch7/wiki/Cheatsheet)
*   [Misc from MIT's 'Advanced Natural Language Processing' course](http://ocw.mit.edu/courses/electrical-engineering-and-computer-science/6-864-advanced-natural-language-processing-fall-2005/)
*   [Misc from MIT's 'Machine Learning' course](http://ocw.mit.edu/courses/electrical-engineering-and-computer-science/6-867-machine-learning-fall-2006/lecture-notes/)
*   [Misc from MIT's 'Networks for Learning: Regression and Classification' course](http://ocw.mit.edu/courses/brain-and-cognitive-sciences/9-520-a-networks-for-learning-regression-and-classification-spring-2001/)
*   [Misc from MIT's 'Neural Coding and Perception of Sound' course](http://ocw.mit.edu/courses/health-sciences-and-technology/hst-723j-neural-coding-and-perception-of-sound-spring-2005/index.htm)
*   [Implementing a Distributed Deep Learning Network over Spark](http://www.datasciencecentral.com/profiles/blogs/implementing-a-distributed-deep-learning-network-over-spark)
*   [A chess AI that learns to play chess using deep learning. (⭐821)](https://github.com/erikbern/deep-pink)
*   [Reproducing the results of "Playing Atari with Deep Reinforcement Learning" by DeepMind (⭐654)](https://github.com/kristjankorjus/Replicating-DeepMind)
*   [Wiki2Vec. Getting Word2vec vectors for entities and word from Wikipedia Dumps (⭐600)](https://github.com/idio/wiki2vec)
*   [The original code from the DeepMind article + tweaks (⭐1.8k)](https://github.com/kuz/DeepMind-Atari-Deep-Q-Learner)
*   [Google deepdream - Neural Network art (⭐13k)](https://github.com/google/deepdream)
*   [An efficient, batched LSTM.](https://gist.github.com/karpathy/587454dc0146a6ae21fc)
*   [A recurrent neural network designed to generate classical music. (⭐1.9k)](https://github.com/hexahedria/biaxial-rnn-music-composition)
*   [Memory Networks Implementations - Facebook (⭐1.8k)](https://github.com/facebook/MemNN)
*   [Face recognition with Google's FaceNet deep neural network. (⭐15k)](https://github.com/cmusatyalab/openface)
*   [Basic digit recognition neural network (⭐96)](https://github.com/joeledenberg/DigitRecognition)
*   [Emotion Recognition API Demo - Microsoft](https://www.projectoxford.ai/demo/emotion#detection)
*   [Proof of concept for loading Caffe models in TensorFlow (⭐2.8k)](https://github.com/ethereon/caffe-tensorflow)
*   [YOLO: Real-Time Object Detection](http://pjreddie.com/darknet/yolo/#webcam)
*   [YOLO: Practical Implementation using Python](https://www.analyticsvidhya.com/blog/2018/12/practical-guide-object-detection-yolo-framewor-python/)
*   [AlphaGo - A replication of DeepMind's 2016 Nature publication, "Mastering the game of Go with deep neural networks and tree search"](https://github.com/Rochester-NRT/AlphaGo)
*   [Machine Learning for Software Engineers (⭐29k)](https://github.com/ZuzooVn/machine-learning-for-software-engineers)
*   [Machine Learning is Fun!](https://medium.com/@ageitgey/machine-learning-is-fun-80ea3ec3c471#.oa4rzez3g)
*   [Siraj Raval's Deep Learning tutorials](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCWN3xxRkmTPmbKwht9FuE5A)
*   [Dockerface (⭐191)](https://github.com/natanielruiz/dockerface) - Easy to install and use deep learning Faster R-CNN face detection for images and video in a docker container.
*   [Awesome Deep Learning Music (⭐2.9k)](https://github.com/ybayle/awesome-deep-learning-music) - Curated list of articles related to deep learning scientific research applied to music
*   [Awesome Graph Embedding (⭐4.8k)](https://github.com/benedekrozemberczki/awesome-graph-embedding) - Curated list of articles related to deep learning scientific research on graph structured data at the graph level.
*   [Awesome Network Embedding (⭐2.6k)](https://github.com/chihming/awesome-network-embedding) - Curated list of articles related to deep learning scientific research on graph structured data at the node level.
*   [Microsoft Recommenders (⭐20k)](https://github.com/Microsoft/Recommenders) contains examples, utilities and best practices for building recommendation systems. Implementations of several state-of-the-art algorithms are provided for self-study and customization in your own applications.
*   [The Unreasonable Effectiveness of Recurrent Neural Networks](http://karpathy.github.io/2015/05/21/rnn-effectiveness/) - Andrej Karpathy blog post about using RNN for generating text.
*   [Ladder Network (⭐100)](https://github.com/divamgupta/ladder_network_keras) - Keras Implementation of Ladder Network for Semi-Supervised Learning
*   [toolbox: Curated list of ML libraries](https://github.com/amitness/toolbox)
*   [CNN Explainer](https://poloclub.github.io/cnn-explainer/)
*   [AI Expert Roadmap (⭐30k)](https://github.com/AMAI-GmbH/AI-Expert-Roadmap) - Roadmap to becoming an Artificial Intelligence Expert
*   [Awesome Drug Interactions, Synergy, and Polypharmacy Prediction (⭐96)](https://github.com/AstraZeneca/awesome-polipharmacy-side-effect-prediction/)
items.content_html:
Table of Contents / Videos and Lectures

  • Understand what is Deep Learning

Researchers / Miscellaneous

  • Caffe Webinar
  • 100 Best Github Resources in Github for DL
  • Word2Vec
  • Caffe DockerFile (⭐81)
  • TorontoDeepLEarning convnet (⭐506)
  • gfx.js (⭐125)
  • Torch7 Cheat sheet (⭐9.1k)
  • Misc from MIT's 'Advanced Natural Language Processing' course
  • Misc from MIT's 'Machine Learning' course
  • Misc from MIT's 'Networks for Learning: Regression and Classification' course
  • Misc from MIT's 'Neural Coding and Perception of Sound' course
  • Implementing a Distributed Deep Learning Network over Spark
  • A chess AI that learns to play chess using deep learning. (⭐821)
  • Reproducing the results of "Playing Atari with Deep Reinforcement Learning" by DeepMind (⭐654)
  • Wiki2Vec. Getting Word2vec vectors for entities and word from Wikipedia Dumps (⭐600)
  • The original code from the DeepMind article + tweaks (⭐1.8k)
  • Google deepdream - Neural Network art (⭐13k)
  • An efficient, batched LSTM.
  • A recurrent neural network designed to generate classical music. (⭐1.9k)
  • Memory Networks Implementations - Facebook (⭐1.8k)
  • Face recognition with Google's FaceNet deep neural network. (⭐15k)
  • Basic digit recognition neural network (⭐96)
  • Emotion Recognition API Demo - Microsoft
  • Proof of concept for loading Caffe models in TensorFlow (⭐2.8k)
  • YOLO: Real-Time Object Detection
  • YOLO: Practical Implementation using Python
  • AlphaGo - A replication of DeepMind's 2016 Nature publication, "Mastering the game of Go with deep neural networks and tree search"
  • Machine Learning for Software Engineers (⭐29k)
  • Machine Learning is Fun!
  • Siraj Raval's Deep Learning tutorials
  • Dockerface (⭐191) - Easy to install and use deep learning Faster R-CNN face detection for images and video in a docker container.
  • Awesome Deep Learning Music (⭐2.9k) - Curated list of articles related to deep learning scientific research applied to music
  • Awesome Graph Embedding (⭐4.8k) - Curated list of articles related to deep learning scientific research on graph structured data at the graph level.
  • Awesome Network Embedding (⭐2.6k) - Curated list of articles related to deep learning scientific research on graph structured data at the node level.
  • Microsoft Recommenders (⭐20k) contains examples, utilities and best practices for building recommendation systems. Implementations of several state-of-the-art algorithms are provided for self-study and customization in your own applications.
  • The Unreasonable Effectiveness of Recurrent Neural Networks - Andrej Karpathy blog post about using RNN for generating text.
  • Ladder Network (⭐100) - Keras Implementation of Ladder Network for Semi-Supervised Learning
  • toolbox: Curated list of ML libraries
  • CNN Explainer
  • AI Expert Roadmap (⭐30k) - Roadmap to becoming an Artificial Intelligence Expert
  • Awesome Drug Interactions, Synergy, and Polypharmacy Prediction (⭐96)

items.title: Awesome Raspberry Pi
items.content_text:
### OS Images

*   [Ubuntu Core](https://ubuntu.com/download/raspberry-pi-core) - Official (minimal) Ubuntu distribution for IoT. Supports Raspberry Pi Zero 2 W. ![Supports Raspberry Pi 2+](https://github.com/thibmaek/awesome-raspberry-pi/raw/main/media/badges/rpi-2+.png)
*   [Ubuntu Server](https://ubuntu.com/raspberry-pi/server) - Ubuntu Server distribution for the Raspberry Pi. Supports Raspberry Pi Zero 2 W. ![Supports Raspberry Pi 2+](https://github.com/thibmaek/awesome-raspberry-pi/raw/main/media/badges/rpi-2+.png)
items.content_html:
OS Images

  • Ubuntu Core - Official (minimal) Ubuntu distribution for IoT. Supports Raspberry Pi Zero 2 W.
  • Ubuntu Server - Ubuntu Server distribution for the Raspberry Pi. Supports Raspberry Pi Zero 2 W.

items.title: Awesome Selfhosted
items.content_text:
### Software / Communication - Custom Communication Systems

*   [Element](https://element.io) - Fully-featured Matrix client for Web, iOS & Android. ([Source Code (⭐12k)](https://github.com/vector-im/element-web)) `Apache-2.0` `Nodejs`

### Software / Communication - IRC

*   [Glowing Bear (⭐962)](https://github.com/glowing-bear/glowing-bear) - A web frontend for WeeChat. ([Demo](https://www.glowing-bear.org)) `GPL-3.0` `Nodejs`
items.content_html:
Software / Communication - Custom Communication Systems

  • Element - Fully-featured Matrix client for Web, iOS & Android. (Source Code (⭐12k)) Apache-2.0 Nodejs

Software / Communication - IRC

  • Glowing Bear (⭐962) - A web frontend for WeeChat. (Demo) GPL-3.0 Nodejs
